title: No pain, no mess
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army. Australian and New Zealand Army Corps

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Armed forces - training
description: Episode number 4 of Series "The Academy". Six weeks into their training and its getting tough for some. Laura is having problems sleeping and trying to survive on four hours sleep a night. The cadets are coming up to their first parade and also their first visit with friends and family since joining ADFA. The third year cadets are on a tour of Gallipoli where they come to terms with the reality of war and loss of life, they also participate in the annual soccer match against Turkey; a match Australia has never won.
